channel.title: epic dog urination technique etc.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "epic dog urination technique etc." - what do they work on?

item.title: Re: epic dog urination technique etc.
item.content:encoded: It's a jutsu that's taught by Good Boy. He's available in the last steps of Outskirts.

item.title: Re: epic dog urination technique etc.
item.content:encoded: thanks, helped a lot. what is 'i need this?'

item.title: Re: epic dog urination technique etc.
item.content:encoded:
The following help with events:

  • WhiteEye

The following help with ally drops

  • Stand by Your Ninja
  • I Need This
  • HoClaus
  • Olmek

The following help with items and finding allies

  • Stand by Your Ninja
  • Epic Dog Urination Technique
  • I Can Has Cheezburger
  • Spot
  • Diagnosis
  • Haus

The following only helps with getting allies:

  • Lucky Sevens

item.title: epic dog urination technique etc.
item.content:encoded:
what do things like 'epic dog urination technique', white eye, 'stand by your ninja' theme, MC stripeypants, haus, etc. affect?

which ones improve the chance of finding ally drops,
which ones improve the chance of finding allies,
which ones improve the chance of finding events (like free chakra, stamina, xp etc.),
which ones improve the chance of finding normal items (like find a kunai on 'catch a kunai' D-rank mission)

also, what else is there that improves this?

thanks
